org.forgerock.openam.rest

Class RealmAwareResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.rest.SubjectAwareResource
      • org.forgerock.openam.rest.RealmAwareResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.json.resource.CollectionResourceProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApplicationsResource, BatchResource, ResourceTypesResource, ScriptResource, ServerInfoResource, SubjectAttributesResourceV1, UserDevicesResource

    public abstract class RealmAwareResource
extends SubjectAwareResource
    Resource capable of determining a realm from a Context.
    Since:
    12.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • getRealm

        protected String getRealm(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context)
        Retrieves the Realm from a provided Context. Returns null if there's no RealmContext in the provided Context.
        Parameters:
        context - The request context.
        Returns:
        a String containing the name of the realm associated with this request, or null if there is no RealmContext in the Context.
